message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you $100000 and keep $900000. Let's seal the deal!
I think a 55/45 split is fairer. We both get a good amount, and it's still a lot more than your initial offer.
Your offer is still too generous to you, Bob. I'll counter with a 60/40 split. I'll take $600000 and you'll get $400000. That's the best I can do!
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, Bob. I'll take $540000 and you'll get $460000. Let's make a deal!
